display_name: Columbia Suicide Severity Ratings Scale Summary Value: Suicidal ideation yes/no in last 3 months
description:
Summary item from a modified version of the CSSRS Questionnaire. [Salvi 2019 (PMID: 31039299)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7974826/)

Formula: Yes if 1 for :cssrs_3mo_1: or :cssrs_3mo_2:, No otherwise

[Search for all CSSRS Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=cssrs)
